languages.text: {n}Иремерисс поступила дерзко, затащив в Комморру пленных псайкеров. Паутина крайне чувствительна к психическим силам, и одно их присутствие может заставить пространство Темного города разойтись по швам, открыв зияющие раны прямиком в варп. Если бы о столь наглой выходке узнали другие кабалы...{/n}

{n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Иремерисс поступила дерзко, затащив в Комморру пленных псайкеров. languages.text: {n}伊芮梅莉斯把那些被俘虏的灵能者带回了科摩罗，这是个非常鲁莽的决定。网道对灵能的力量极为敏感，而灵能者的存在本身，可能会撕开通往亚空间的裂隙，令黑暗之城分崩离析。如果其他阴谋团知道她这么胆大妄为的话……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊芮梅莉斯把那些被俘虏的灵能者带回了科摩罗，这是个非常鲁莽的决定。网道对灵能的力量极为敏感，而灵能者的存在本身，可能会撕开通往亚空间的裂隙，令黑暗之城分崩离析。如果其他阴谋团知道她这么胆大妄为的话……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss fue imprudente al decidir traer psíquicos cautivos hasta Commorragh. La Telaraña es extremadamente sensible a sus poderes, por lo que la mera presencia de los psíquicos podría destrozar la Ciudad Siniestra y abrir enormes portales a la disformidad. Si las otras Kábalas descubrieran esta temeridad...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss fue imprudente al decidir traer psíquicos cautivos hasta Commorragh. La Telaraña es extremadamente sensible a sus poderes, por lo que la mera presencia de los psíquicos podría destrozar la Ciudad Siniestra y abrir enormes portales a la disformidad. Si las otras Kábalas descubrieran esta temeridad...{/n}

languages.text: {n}捕虜にした異能者をコモラフに連れ帰ることを決めたとき、イレメリスは無謀な行動をとった。網辻はサイキック・パワーに非常に敏感で、異能者の存在は仄暗き都を引き裂き、歪みへと続く亀裂を開く恐れがある。もし他の陰謀団がこの大胆な行動を知れば…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}捕虜にした異能者をコモラフに連れ帰ることを決めたとき、イレメリスは無謀な行動をとった。網辻はサイキック・パワーに非常に敏感で、異能者の存在は仄暗き都を引き裂き、歪みへと続く亀裂を開く恐れがある。もし他の陰謀団がこの大胆な行動を知れば…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss hat fahrlässig gehandelt, als sie entschieden hat, gefangen genommene Psioniker zurück nach Commorragh zu bringen. Das Netz der Tausend Tore ist extrem anfällig für psychische Kräfte, und die Anwesenheit der Psioniker könnte die Nähte der Dunklen Stadt platzen lassen, wodurch sich gewaltige Klüfte zum Warp öffnen könnten. Wenn die anderen Kabalen von diesem wagemutigen Vorgehen wüssten ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss hat fahrlos gehandelt, als sie entschieden hat, gefangen genommene Psioniker zurück nach Commorragh zu bringen. Das Netz der Tausend Tore ist extrem anfällig für psychische Kräfte, und die Anwesenheit der Psioniker könnte die Nähte der Dunklen Stadt platzen lassen, wodurch sich gewaltige Klüfte zum Warp öffnen könnten. Wenn die anderen Kabalen von diesem wagemutigen Vorgehen wüssten ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss a fait preuve d'imprudence en décidant de ramener des psykers prisonniers à Commorragh. La Toile étant particulièrement sensible aux pouvoirs psychiques, leur présence pourrait entraîner la désagrégation de la cité Crépusculaire et l'ouverture de failles béantes sur le Warp. Si seulement les autres Kabales étaient au courant de ce coup audacieux...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss a fait preuve d'imprudence en décidant de ramener des psykers prisonniers à Commorragh. La Toile étant particulièrement sensible aux pouvoirs psychiques, leur présence pourrait entraîner la désagrégation de la cité Crépusculaire et l'ouverture de failles béantes sur le Warp. Si seulement les autres Kabales étaient au courant de ce coup audacieux...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yremeryss, tutsak ruhsezerleri Commorragh'a getirmeye karar vermekle pervasız bir hareket yapmış. Ağyol, ruhsezi güçlerine karşı son derece hassas. Ruhsezerlerin varlığı yüzünden Kara Şehir parçalara ayrılıp öteboyuta giden yırtıklara yol açabilir. Diğer Kaballar, bu küstah numarayı bir duysa...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Yremeryss acted recklessly when she decided to bring captive psykers back to Commorragh. The Webway is extremely sensitive to psychic powers and the psykers' presence could force the Dark City apart at the seams, opening gaping chasms to the warp. If the other Kabals knew about this audacious stunt...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yremeryss, tutsak ruhsezerleri Commorragh'a getirmeye karar vermekle pervasız bir hareket yapmış. Ağyol, psişik güçlere karşı son derece hassas. Ruhsezerlerin varlığı yüzünden Kara Şehir parçalara ayrılıp öteboyuta giden yırtıklara yol açabilir. Diğer Kaballar bu küstah numarayı bir duysa...{/n}
